column4: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
An airplane crew takes ill. Surely the only person capable of landing the plane is an ex-pilot afraid to fly. But don't call him Shirley.
A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.
Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, black-market opportunist Harry Lime.
A heinous crime and its aftermath are recalled from differing points of view.
Following WWII and with China brought to it's knees by the actions of the Japanese, prior to the rise of the Communists.
Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.
Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.
A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.
The story of a young boy, Apu, and life in his small Indian village. His parents are quite poor - his father Harihar.
A flamboyant and controversial British military figure and his conflicted loyalties during his World War I service in the Middle East.
A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.
A man and his son search for a stolen bicycle vital for his job.
A dramatized account of a great Russian naval mutiny and a resulting street demonstration which brought on a police massacre.
Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.
When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.
